https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/tCj1CCoow4ylrEC2XBlyKhCu9w6.jpg Documentary about the work of Claude Lorius, who began studying Antarctic ice in 1957, and, in 1965, was the first scientist to be concerned about global warming. Antarctica: Ice & Sky
